1010001111010011 0001101011111010 0 -> sum: 1011111011001101, cout: 0
0100010111110111 1100110111001000 1 -> sum: 0001001111000000, cout: 1
0110010111011000 1000000011000011 1 -> sum: 1110011010011100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
